1. NA = IP && NM
BA = IP || (!NM)
BA = 168.214.80.0 || (!255.255.248.0)
BA = 

10101000.11010110.01010000.00000000
or
00000000.00000000.00000111.11111111

BA = 10101000.11010110.01010111.11111111
BA = 168.214.87.255

2. 2^11 IPs

N12345 : 5IP
N5w: 2IP

2048 IP addresses

n devices + 1 router + 1 NA + 1 BA => n + 3

N1: 416+3 = 419 < 2^9, 9 zeros, 32-9 = 23 ones /23
N2: 384+3 = 387 < 2^9 /23
N3: 96+3 = 99 < 2^7 /25
N4: 160+3 = 163 < 2^8 /24
N5: 32+3 = 35 < 2^6 /26
N12345: 5+2 = 7 < 2^3 /29
N5w: 2+2 = 4 <= 2^2 / 30

2^9 + 2^9 + 2^7 + 2^8 + 2^6 + 2^3 + 2^2 = 1484 < 2048

N1 = 168.214.80.0/23 R1 = .1, S1 = .2

N2
	10101000.11010110.01010000.00000000 +
 	00000000.00000000.00000010.00000000
N2 = 168.214.82.0/23	 R2 = .1, S2web = .2
N3 = 168.214.82.128/25 R3 = .129, S3dns = .130
N4 = 168.214.83.128/24 R4 = .129
N5 = 168.214.83.192/24 R5 = .193
N12345 = 168.214.83.200/29 R1 = .201, R2 = .202, R3 = .203, R4 = .204, R5 = .205
N5w = 168.214.83.130/30  R5 = .131, Rw = .132
